title: Wli Waterfalls & Mountain Adventure
description: An exciting two-day trip to the Volta Region to hike to Ghana's highest waterfalls and explore the beautiful mountain scenery.

itinerary.title: Journey to the Volta & Waterfall Hike
itinerary.details:
*   Morning pickup from your location in Accra.
*   Scenic drive to the Volta Region, passing through lush landscapes.
*   Arrive at Wli and check into your guesthouse.
*   Afternoon hike to the spectacular Wli Waterfalls, Ghana's highest falls. You can swim in the cool, refreshing pool at the base.
*   Evening relaxation and dinner.

itinerary.title: Monkey Sanctuary & Return to Accra
itinerary.details:
*   Morning visit to the Tafi Atome Monkey Sanctuary to interact with friendly Mona monkeys.
*   Begin the journey back to Accra.
*   Stop for a local lunch en route.
*   Arrive back in Accra in the late afternoon.

title: Cape Coast & Elmina History Tour
description: A profound journey into Ghana's past. Visit the historic slave castles of Cape Coast and Elmina, and walk the Kakum canopy.

itinerary.title: Coastal Drive & Kakum Canopy Walk
itinerary.details:
*   Depart from Accra and drive along the scenic coast to the Central Region.
*   Visit Kakum National Park and experience the thrilling canopy walkway, suspended 40 meters above the rainforest floor.
*   Check into your hotel in Cape Coast/Elmina.
itinerary.overnight: Hotel in Cape Coast or Elmina

itinerary.title: The Slave Castles
itinerary.details:
*   In the morning, take a guided tour of the historic Cape Coast Castle, a former slave trading post.
*   In the afternoon, visit Elmina Castle, the oldest European building in sub-Saharan Africa, and learn about its somber history.
*   Explore the bustling fishing town of Elmina.
itinerary.overnight: Hotel in Cape Coast or Elmina

itinerary.title: Assin Manso & Return Journey
itinerary.details:
*   Visit Assin Manso, the site of the 'Last Bath' where enslaved Africans were bathed before being sent to the castles.
*   Participate in a solemn wreath-laying and naming ceremony.
*   Begin your journey back to Accra, arriving in the evening.

title: Mole National Park Safari
description: Experience the thrill of a safari in Ghana's largest wildlife refuge. See elephants, antelopes, and hundreds of bird species.

itinerary.title: Fly North & Settle In
itinerary.details:
*   Morning flight from Accra to Tamale.
*   Our guide will meet you at the airport and begin the drive to Mole National Park.
*   Check into your hotel (Mole Motel or Zaina Lodge).
*   Afternoon jeep safari to get your first glimpse of the park's wildlife.

itinerary.title: Full Day Safari Experience
itinerary.details:
*   Early morning walking safari with an armed ranger to track elephants on foot.
*   Return to the hotel for breakfast and relaxation by the pool, which overlooks a watering hole.
*   Late afternoon jeep safari to explore a different area of the park and see more animals as they come out to graze.

itinerary.title: Local Culture & Return to Tamale
itinerary.details:
*   Optional final morning safari.
*   Visit the nearby Larabanga Mosque, the oldest mosque in Ghana, and the mystical stone.
*   Drive back to Tamale and check into your hotel.
*   Explore the Tamale Central Market.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.details:
*   Enjoy a final northern breakfast.
*   Transfer to Tamale Airport for your flight back to Accra.

title: Accra City Vibe Tour
description: Discover the vibrant heart of Ghana's capital. Explore bustling markets, historical landmarks, and the trendy arts scene of Accra.

itinerary.title: A Day in Accra
itinerary.details:
*   **Morning:** Visit the Kwame Nkrumah Memorial Park & Mausoleum and Independence Square, the heart of Ghana's history.
*   **Mid-day:** Explore the bustling Makola Market to experience the city's vibrant trade. Then head to Jamestown to see the lighthouse and the local fishing community.
*   **Afternoon:** Visit the W.E.B. Du Bois Centre for Pan-African Culture. End the day with some souvenir shopping at the Arts Centre.
*   Drop off at your hotel or preferred location.
